description:
It`s little sister vs. girlfriend as Kosaka and Kanata "fight" for Shinozaki`s attention. Later, Kosaka begs Ariyama for cooking lessons and gets more than she bargained for.
Source: Amazon

titles.title: "Just Whip It Out Now!" ...Can I Say That?
"Sono Mama Dashite!" tte Ieba Ii no?
"Vas-y, balance la sauce !" C`est ça qu`il faut dire ?
Du kannst ruhig kommen!" ... brauch ich nur zu sagen?
『そのまま出して!』... って言えばいいの?
